about_the_game:
Ocean Cat is a very fun fishing game. The main character of the game is a cute little cat wearing a diving suit, exploring the underwater world and searching for various delicious seafood. Your task is to help this little cat catch different marine creatures using a harpoon, including fish, jellyfish,, and more.

There are various types of harpoons in the game, each with different lengths, diameters, and materials. Players can choose different harpoons according to their needs, and each harpoon has its specific catching effect and usage conditions. When you successfully catch a marine creature, you will earn points and rewards such as In Ocean Cat, players take on the role of a curious feline who has donned a wetsuit and scuba gear to explore the depths of the ocean and try their hand at fishing. Armed with a trusty harpoon gun, players must carefully aim and fire at schools of fish, earning points for every successful catch.

The game features a variety of different fish species, each with their own unique characteristics and behaviors. Some are fast and agile, requiring quick reflexes to take down, while others are slow and cumbersome, but offer a greater reward for catching them. As players progress through the game, they can unlock new and improved harpoon guns, each with its own strengths and weaknesses.

Ocean Cat is a fast-paced and exciting game that is sure to keep players hooked. With its colorful graphics, fun gameplay, and challenging mechanics, it's the perfect game for anyone who loves action and adventure. So why not take the plunge and join the brave little cat as it explores the mysteries of the deep?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 8/9/10/11
  • Processor: I3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 8/9/10/11
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
